content: this legal text summarizes a court ruling in a civil case involving multiple parties the court assigns different properties such as apartments and box rooms to the parties involved they also order certain parties to reimburse each other for expenses incurred the court divides movable property like shares and insurance funds among the parties based on their hereditary shares additionally the court determines compensation for the exclusive use of certain properties the court revokes a previous order for the sale of the estate and instead allocates the properties to the parties each party is responsible for their own litigation costs in this case the court assigns properties to mapa and ugpa and also assigns properties to defendants fema fean feal felu feag and fete ugpa and mapa are ordered to pay a settlement of euro 12305803 to tupa while fema fean feal felu feag and fete are ordered to pay a settlement of euro 1629140 to tupa the court assigns movable properties such as shares and securities custody accounts to the parties involved reimbursement expenses are also ordered to be paid to mapa the court fully compensates the parties for the costs of litigation and determines that the expenses of the case will be divided among the parties according to their respective shares the ruling was made on april 9 2019 and filed in the clerks office on may 16 2019

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale di Nola I sez. Civile, 16/05/2019 n. 1118
